channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Delicious -- Delicious Recipes – WordPress Recipe Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Delicious -- Delicious Recipes – WordPress Recipe Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-43935|2024-08-29T18:16:46.071Z -- wp%20delicious -- delicious%20recipes%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20recipe%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Delicious Delicious Recipes – WordPress Recipe Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Delicious Recipes – WordPress Recipe Plugin: from n/a through 1.6.7.
